User

Class UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • User.UserController

  • public class UserController
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that interacts with the contructed Database Controller and account controller. Interacts with the classes based on User Interactions
    Version:
    3/20/18
    Author:
    Alexis Neas

      • searchSchool

        public java.util.ArrayList<University.University> searchSchool(java.lang.String schoolName,
                                                               java.lang.String stateName,
                                                               java.lang.String location,
                                                               java.lang.String control,
                                                               int lowNumberOfStudents,
                                                               int upNumberOfStudents,
                                                               double lowPercentFemale,
                                                               double upPercentFemale,
                                                               double lowSATVerbal,
                                                               double upSATVerbal,
                                                               double lowSATMath,
                                                               double upSATMath,
                                                               double lowExpenses,
                                                               double upExpenses,
                                                               double lowPercentEnrolled,
                                                               double upPercentEnrolled,
                                                               int lowAcademicsScale,
                                                               int upAcademicsScale,
                                                               int lowSocialScale,
                                                               int upSocialScale,
                                                               int lowQualityOfLifeScale,
                                                               int upQualityOfLifeScale,
                                                               java.lang.String emphases1,
                                                               java.lang.String emphases2,
                                                               java.lang.String emphases3,
                                                               java.lang.String emphases4,
                                                               java.lang.String emphases5)
        Takes a list of search criteria inputed by user, and returns a list of Universities in an order of relevance
        Parameters:
        schoolName - Name of the school to search for.
        stateName - Name of the state for schools.
        location - Location area of a school.
        control - Private State or City control.
        lowNumberOfStudents - Lower limit for student population.
        upNumberOfStudents - Upper limit for student population.
        lowPercentFemale - Lower limit for Percent Female.
        upPercentFemale - Upper limit for Percent Female.
        lowSATVerbal - Lower limit for SATVerbal.
        upSATVerbal - Upper limit for SATVerbal.
        lowSATMath - Lower limit for SATMath.
        upSATMath - Upper limit for SATMath.
        lowExpenses - Lower limit for Expenses.
        upExpenses - Upper limit for Expenses.
        lowPercentEnrolled - Lower limit for Percent Enrolled.
        upPercentEnrolled - Upper limit for Percent Enrolled.
        lowAcademicsScale - Lower limit for Academics Scale.
        upAcademicsScale - Upper limit for Academics Scale.
        lowSocialScale - Lower limit for Social Scale.
        upSocialScale - Upper limit for Social Scale.
        lowQualityOfLifeScale - Lower limit for Quality Of Life Scale.
        upQualityOfLifeScale - Upper limit for Quality Of Life Scale.
        emphases1 - one of the emphases of the university
        emphases2 - one of the emphases of the university
        emphases3 - one of the emphases of the university
        emphases4 - one of the emphases of the university
        emphases5 - one of the emphases of the university
        Returns:
        the university objects closest to the search in an ArrayList
